column1: #Text='What are you going to tell your daughters?'
#Text=We are going to tell them that plenty of other countries in the world have elected female leaders, prime ministers, and presidents.
#Text=Some of them even 'third world countries'.We are going to tell them that being female is no guarantee that they will succeed, or get the top job.
#Text=We are going to tell them, when they run for election, their gender is no guarantee of winning or losing.
#Text=And we are going to tell them that the most qualified person does not always get the the elected position.
#Text=And we are going to tell our sons the exact same thing.
